Description: This auction is for an EVH Wolfgang Special striped series guitar 2 pickup version in excellent condition. This has the carved top like a les Paul. It is a great guitar and plays easy. This guitar is in excellent condition show room quality. Maple neck, basswood body, 25.5” scale, Evh Wolfgang humbuckers, locking trem with the dtuna for quick drop d tuning. The EVH guitars are made by Fender and are of excellent quality. The guitar plays easy and sounds great. Comes with a new generic hardshell case (for shipping safety), trem bar and Alan wrenches. Amazing sustain. Bid with confidence, I have 100% positive feedback. Shipping price includes insurance Please check out my other auctions for more gear EVH Wolfgang Special Solidbody Electric Guitar - Black and Yellow Stripes This EVH Wolfgang Special solidbody evokes Eddie Van Halen's iconic Bumblebee electric guitar. Its archtop basswood body fits like a gloveu. Its graphite-reinforced quartersawn maple neck is stable and comfortable and the hand-rubbed urethane gel back finish only adds to its playability. Ultra-high-speed techniques seem effortless on this guitar's compound-radius fingerboard. Experience the dynamic, articulate voicing and near-endless sustain of direct-mounted EVH Wolfgang humbuckers. Dive-bomb to your heart's content with an EVH-branded Floyd Rose locking trem. The EVH Wolfgang Special solidbody electric guitar is tailor-made for high-performance playing. GENERAL Model Name: Wolfgang® Special Striped, Maple Fingerboard, Black and Yellow Series: Wolfgang® Special Color: Black with Yellow Stripes BODY Body Shape: Wolfgang® Body Material: Basswood NECK Neck Material: Maple Neck Shape: Wolfgang Backshape Scale Length: 25.5" (648 mm) Fingerboard Radius: 12" to 16" Compound Radius (304.8 mm to 406.4 mm) Number of Frets: 22 Fret Size: Jumbo String Nut: Floyd Rose® R2 Locking Nut Width: 1.625" (41.3 mm) Headstock: EVH®-Branded Neck Plate: NA Neck Finish: Hand-Rubbed Urethane Gel Fingerboard: Maple Position Inlays: Black Dots ELECTRONICS Bridge Pickup: EVH® Wolfgang Humbucking Neck Pickup: EVH® Wolfgang Humbucking Controls: Volume (500K EVH Bourns Low Friction Pot) , Tone (250K EVH Bourns High Friction) Pickup Switching: 3-Position Toggle: Position 1. Bridge Pickup, Position 2. Bridge And Neck Pickups, Position 3. Title: EVH Van Halen Wolfgang Special striped series Carved top Electric Guitar D-Tuna
ConditionDescription: Excellent condition comes with a new plain hardshell case.  This is the Two pickup version with the carved/arched top.
